about_the_game:
ReThink | Lite is a Puzzle Game in a peaceful futuristic setting, and a spiritual successor to ReThink 2 that features a variety of Puzzles that utilize Lasers and the behavior of light and it's colors to create challenging problems to solve.

Use new and proven gameplay mechanics to puzzle your way through the game's beautiful world, which is now filled with even more puzzles than in previous games.




Based on how ReThink 2 worked, ReThink | Lite offers an experience that is easier to handle and control than ReThink 3/4, while still giving you something to think about.

The Game features more than 50 Puzzles (unique to this game) that make use many of the new features known from ReThink 4 and old ones known from ReThink 2 alike.


Improved Cubes, Features and controls:

Improvements of some cubes and the addition of a new cube give more control to the player and add new problems to solve.


Interactive puzzle elements are more accessible and the game is easier to control than ReThink 2 due to improved interactions and handling of objects like cubes.

Improved Graphics:

Thanks to Unreal Engine 5, ReThink | Lite looks a lot better than its spiritual predecessor, while still running "as usual" on older systems when the new graphics are disabled.


Fully dynamic Global Illumination makes the simplistic style of the game shine, while not limiting player actions or Puzzles like previous lighting methods would have.

Temporal Super Resolution improves overall image quality. No more blurry images, more details, no need for additional AntiAliasing.

name: ReThink | Lite

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: AMD Phenom / Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 470 / nvidia GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game will not run on Windows 7 and/or DirectX 11.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 / Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 480 / nvidia GTX 980
  • Storage: 6000 MB available space

short_description: ReThink | Lite is a Puzzle Game in a peaceful futuristic setting, that is a spiritual successor to ReThink 2 and features a variety of Puzzles that utilize Lasers and the behavior of light and it's colors to create challenging problems to solve.
